Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Handles GUI, user input, rendering of the board and bricks, game states, and score display.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after the FXML has been loaded. Sets up fonts, keyboard event handlers, next brick panel, and initial UI.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • initGameView

      public void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData brick)
      Sets up the initial game view. Initializes the display matrices for the board and the current brick.
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the initial state of the game board matrix
      brick - initial ViewData object for the first falling brick

    • refreshGameBackground

      public void refreshGameBackground(int[][] board)
      Updates the game background.
      Parameters:
      board - latest game board matrix.

    • setEventListener

      public void setEventListener(InputEventListener eventListener)
      Sets eventListener.
      Parameters:
      eventListener - a InputEventListener object handling the game logic

    • bindScore

      public void bindScore(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty integerProperty)
      Binds score to integer property.
      Parameters:
      integerProperty - score property

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      Shows game over panel and stop the game.

    • newGame

      public void newGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Creates a new game.

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame()
      Pauses game.

    • setFinalScore

      public void setFinalScore(int score)
      Sets the final score achieved in the game.
      Parameters:
      score - the final score

    • bindLevel

      public void bindLevel(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty integerProperty)
      Binds level value to integer property.
      Parameters:
      integerProperty - level property

    • completeLevels

      public void completeLevels()
      Shows congratulations panel when all levels are completed. It also checks and updates the high score.

    • updateGameSpeed

      public void updateGameSpeed(int level)
      Stops the current game timer and restart it with a new speed according to the current level.
      Parameters:
      level - the current game level
